QuestData.Title: Cocooned!
QuestData.Description: Now that the tunnels have been sealed, our next concern is recovering those who have fallen to the enemy.$b$bWith any luck, several of our soldiers are still alive and relatively well inside the nerubian cocoons.$b$bFree them, $c, while you still can!
QuestData.LogDescription: Captain Rupert wants you to open the Nerubian Cocoons in Drak'Sotra and return to him once you have freed 3 Captive Footmen.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you freed our soldiers from the clutches of the nerubians?
QuestData.RewardText: These nerubians have taken a heavy toll, $c.$b$bNevertheless, I am grateful for your efforts.
